title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competency: Generative AI and Cognitive Presence Enhancement via Six Thinking Hats

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic AI concepts and foundational knowledge in instructional design
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: They can explain three or more core functions of generative AI and its educational applications.
They can analyze complex social issues through structured discussions by applying the Six Thinking Hats technique.
They can apply cognitive presence enhancement strategies to project outcomes by combining GenAI tools with Six Thinking Hats discussions.
They can recognize differences in GenAI effectiveness based on creativity levels and establish personalized learning strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
